alert.note: Alert for Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 12:48AM EST until January 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches from later tonight through Sunday evening. * WHERE...Somerset County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A light glaze of ice is possible through early this morning as patches of freezing drizzle are occurring. The snow will pick up in intensity in the morning and should taper off before Midnight.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
